Class ClientEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • ClientEngine

  • public class ClientEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the Client Engine Connects the user to the server Makes remote playin possible
    Author:
    Michelle M Ortiz & Mario Orbegoso
